QuestData.Title: As the Crow Flies
QuestData.Description: We must determine how widespread the naga's activity truly is and react accordingly.$B$BExploring each body of water in Zangarmarsh could be a lengthy undertaking. If you allow me to, I will use my magic to mold your shape to one more suited to scouting the marsh.$B$BHold this amulet above the balcony near me when you're ready to begin. I will guide your way back to safety after we're done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ysiel Windsinger wants you to use the Stormcrow Amulet to explore the major lakes in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.RewardText: It is as I suspected. The naga have set up pumping stations at all the major lakes in Zangarmarsh. $B$BThey must be stopped if the marsh is to have a future.
